title: What Do Climate Summits Actually Achieve?
sub_head: Students discuss if the COP26 summit is doing any good.
body: Editor’s note: In this Future View, students discuss climate summits. Next week we’ll ask, “A truck driver in New Jersey driver appears to have defeated the president of the New Jersey state senate, the second most powerful person in New Jersey. What do the recent off-year elections bode for next year’s midterm elections?” Students should click here to submit opinions of fewer than 250 words before Nov. 16. The best responses will be published that night.
